Element.Name: PAYEE
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about the Payee, i.e. the role that receives the payment. Shall be used when the Payee is different from the Seller.

Element.Name: Payee identifier or bank assigned creditor identifier
Element.Description: This element is used for both the identification of the Payee, or the unique banking reference identifier of Payee (assigned by the Payee bank.) For payee identification use ICD code list, for SEPA bank assigned creditor reference, use SEPA.

Attribute.Name: Payee or bank assigned creditor identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the payee identifier. For bank assigned creditor identifier (BT-90), value MUST be "SEPA"

Element.Name: Payee legal registration identifier
Element.Description: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Payee as a legal entity or person.

Attribute.Name: Payee legal registration identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Payee legal registration identifier.
